snippet: A Tokyo-based sushi restaurant chain owner paid 155.4 million yen, or about $1.76 million, for a 488-pound bluefin, or about $3,600 per pound.
lead_paragraph: A Tokyo-based sushi restaurant chain owner paid 155.4 million yen, or about $1.76 million, for a 488-pound bluefin, or about $3,600 per pound.

headline.main: New High for Tuna at Tokyo Fish Sale
headline.print_headline: New High for Tuna At Tokyo Fish Sale
